scripts.kill-ports: bash -lc 'lsof -nP -i:8081 -t | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -nP -i:19000 -t | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -nP -i:19001 -t | xargs -r kill -9'
scripts.start:clean: yarn kill-ports && yarn clean:caches && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" expo start -c --dev-client
scripts.start:optimized: yarn kill-ports && yarn clean:caches && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=development expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 4
scripts.start:ultra: yarn kill-ports && yarn clean:caches && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=development expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 6
scripts.start:ultra-fast: yarn kill-ports && yarn clean:caches && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=production expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 6 --no-dev --minify
scripts.start:fast: yarn kill-ports && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=development expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 8 --reset-cache
scripts.start:turbo: yarn kill-ports && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=development expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 12 --reset-cache --no-dev
scripts.start:ultra-optimized: yarn kill-ports && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 NODE_ENV=development expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 16 --no-dev --minify
scripts.start:lightning: yarn kill-ports && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 NODE_ENV=production expo start -c --dev-client --max-workers 20 --no-dev --minify
scripts.analyze:bundle: npx expo export --platform all --output-dir ./dist && npx bundle-analyzer ./dist/index.js
